content.prompt: The work on the left is an oil painting, while the work on the right is in which of the following media?

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
